property.name: Text
property.value: The Red Viper does not kneel to attack an opponent who controls more characters than you.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Renown. Immune to events and character abilities.

property.name: Text
property.value: While Arianne Martell is attacking, raise the Claim value on your revealed plot card by 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: If a player loses a challenge as the attacker, that player must fulfill the claim of that challenge, using the Claim value on the defending player's plot card.

property.name: ErrataText
property.value: When an attacker is fulfilling the claim of a lost [POW] challenge because of Doran Martell's effect, the attacker must move the power from his or her House card to the defending player's House card.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Knight. House Dayne.

property.name: Text
property.value: If Darkstar would be discarded from your hand or deck, put him into play instead.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Martell only. Vengeful. Renown.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you lose a challenge by 4 or more total STR, kneel Areo Hotah to choose and kill 1 character.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Bastard. Sand Snake.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you lose a challenge in which Sarella Sand participated as an attacker, kneel 1 influence to choose and stand 1 participating character.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you lose a challenge, move 1 power from any character to Ellaria Sand.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Lord. Ally.

property.name: Text
property.value: While you have 7 or more cards in your hand, Harmen Uller does not kneel to attack.

property.name: House
property.value: Lannister. Martell.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Knight. Kingsguard.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After Ser Aerys Oakheart comes into play, choose and discard 1 Ally or Mercenary character from play.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Renown. No attachments except Weapon.

property.name: Text
property.value: After you play House Messenger from your hand, reveal the top 2 cards of your deck to all players. Then, put 1 of those cards into your hand, and the other on the bottom of your deck.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Knight. House Dayne.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Knight. House Dayne.

property.name: Traits
property.value: House Dayne.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any Phase: Kill House Dayne Skirmisher (cannot be saved) to draw 1 card. Then, each opponent chooses and discards 1 card from his or her hand.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: No attachments.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any Phase: Discard Orphan of the Greenblood from play (cannot be saved) to choose 1 character. Until the end of the phase, that character loses a [MIL], an [INT], and a [POW] icon.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After The Viper's Bannermen comes into play or leaves play, reveal the top 2 cards of your deck, then put them into your hand.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Stealth. Deadly. No attachments.

property.name: Restricted
property.value: Joust. Melee.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Army. House Dayne.

property.name: Text
property.value: If House Dayne Reserves is discarded from your hand for the claim of an [INT] challenge, put it into play instead of your discard pile. Any Phase: Kneel 1 influence to return House Dayne Reserves to its owner's hand.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Martell only. No attachments.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attached character gets +1 STR. Response: After you lose a challenge as the defender, attached character claims 1 power.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any Phase: Kneel 1 influence to have attached character lose 1 icon of your choice until the end of the phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After 1 of your [Martell] characters is killed, choose and kill 1 character with equal or lower STR. (Limit 1 per phase.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: Cancel the effects of a response without an influence cost. Then, attach He Calls It Thinking to a [Martell] character (counts as a Boon attachment with the text "Attached character gets +2 STR.").

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Martell only.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: Kneel 1 influence to choose 1 character. Until the end of the phase, that character loses a [MIL], an [INT], and a [POW] icon.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Martell only.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you lose dominance, kneel 2 influence to return all standing characters to their owner's hands.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Martell only.

property.name: Text
property.value: Plot: Kneel 5 influence or 2 [Noble] characters to choose and reveal a new plot card. (If it is Summer, you may play Scheming on the Sand during the Challenge phase.)

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Martell only.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you lose a challenge as the defender, kneel 2 influence to cancel the claim effect of that challenge. Then, choose an opponent to satisfy the claim of that challenge as if he or she had lost the challenge as the defender.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Martell only.

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: Kneel Dornish Fiefdoms to lower the cost of the next [Martell] card you play this phase by 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: You may choose to play Lord Doran's Chambers as an attachment to your House card.

property.name: House
property.value: Martell. Targaryen.

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: Discard Summer Sea from play to reduce the cost of the next [Targaryen] or [Martell] character you play this phase by 2.

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: Kneel Palace Fountains to reduce the cost of the next [Martell] card you play this phase by 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: Kneel Dorne to choose 1 Trait. Until the end of the phase, reduce the gold cost for you to marshall cards with that Trait by 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: Characters without an [INT] icon cannot declare stealth.

property.name: Text
property.value: Characters without a Militaryicon get -1 STR.

property.name: Text
property.value: Characters without a [POW] icon cannot claim power for renown.

property.name: House
property.value: Stark. Lannister.

property.name: Text
property.value: After a character's STR is lowered, return The Hound to his owner's hand.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: No attachments except Weapon.

property.name: House
property.value: Lannister. Baratheon.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After a Small Council event is played, kneel 3 influence or kneel 1 [Noble] character to choose and discard from play 1 character with 1 or more power on it.

property.name: House
property.value: Stark. Baratheon.

property.name: Text
property.value: While Brienne of Tarth is participating in a challenge, opponents cannot trigger effects.

property.name: House
property.value: Stark. Greyjoy.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Lord. Ironborn.

property.name: Text
property.value: After any player loses a challenge by 4 or more total STR, he or she names either "character" or "location", then chooses and discards from play (cannot be saved) 1 card of the named type he or she controls, if able.

property.name: House
property.value: Stark. Targaryen.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Knight. Traitor.

property.name: Text
property.value: After Ser Jorah Mormont leaves play, all characters you control get -1 STR until the end of the phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After a character you control leaves play, choose and kneel 1 character controlled by an opponent. Then, draw 1 card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you win an [INT] challenge by 4 or more total STR, choose a challenge type. Until the end of the phase, the losing opponent cannot attack or defend during that challenge type. Limit 1 per phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you win a challenge and count 8 or more total STR, claim 3 power for your House. (Limit 1 per phase.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: Choose 1 opponent. You and that opponent each draw 2 cards.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Condition. Decree.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to your House card. Limit 1 per House card. You need 2 fewer power in order to win the game.

property.name: Text
property.value: After you play Court Advisor, draw 1 card. Attached character gains an [INT] icon.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attached character gains a [POW] icon. While any revealed plot card has the Power Struggle trait, attached character gets +4 STR.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Item. Weapon.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attached character gets +2 STR and gains a Militaryicon. Any Phase: Kneel 1 influence to attach Rusted Sword from your hand to a character you control.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Night's Watch.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any Phase: Kneel 1 influence to choose 1 Night's Watch character. Until the end of the phase, that character gets +1 STR.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: No attachments.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: Kneel 1 influence to choose 1 Wildling character. Until the end of the phase, that character gets +1 STR.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any Phase: Kneel Kingsguard Squire to choose and stand 1 Kingsguard character.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After a [MIL] challenge resolves, kneel 1 influence to have the losing player choose 1 participating character and put that character on top of its owner's deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Former Champion gets -2 STR for each power on him. While Former Champion has 3 or less STR, he gains a [POW] icon and deadly. While Former Champion has 1 or less STR, he gains an [INT] icon and stealth.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Item. Weapon.

property.name: Text
property.value: After A Pinch of Powder comes out of Shadows, attach it to a character. Limited Response: After you win an [INT] or [POW] challenge by 3 or more STR, return the attached character to its owner's hand. Then, you may kneel 3 influence to return A Pinch of Powder to Shadows. (Limit 1 limited response per round.)

property.name: Traits
property.value: Military Battle.

property.name: Text
property.value: At the end of the challenge phase, each player who has not won a Militarychallenge must choose and kill 1 character he or she controls.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Intrigue Gambit.

property.name: Text
property.value: After you win an [INT] challenge, choose and discard 1 attachment from play.

property.name: Text
property.value: All characters get -1 STR and are discarded from play (cannot be saved) if their STR is 0.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Power Struggle.

property.name: Text
property.value: When revealed, the opponent to your left chooses 1 Lord and 1 Lady character, if able. Then, you must choose and kill 1 of those characters. The other claims 2 power.

property.name: Text
property.value: When revealed, kneel all locations.

property.name: Text
property.value: You may play cards from other Houses without paying a gold penalty.

property.name: Text
property.value: Characters you control do not kneel to attack this round.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Martell only.
